content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 2 ** the spider stitch has such a soft and beautiful texture combining this stitch into a washcloth pattern creates a super soft crochet washcloth **the video tutorial for the spider stitch can be found here https //youtu be/uffauyyxvvu** the pattern is written in us terminology skill level - easy hooks needed 4 mm & 4 5 mm yarn used 100% cotton worsted #4 yarn return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 2 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
